thread.title: Best Sportfishing Resort Marina Fiesta Highlights Upcoming Bisbee Tournament
thread.title_full: Best Sportfishing Resort Marina Fiesta Highlights Upcoming Bisbee Tournament

author: Media Relations
title: Best Sportfishing Resort Marina Fiesta Highlights Upcoming Bisbee Tournament
text:
Marina Fiesta is one of the top Cabo San Lucas and Los Cabo resorts around, offering travelers who are in the area the perfect place to unwind. The fall season can be a busy one, what with children beginning the school year and preparing for the hectic holiday season. That’s why it’s so important to take some time away before all the craziness kicks in to have fun with loved ones in Mexico, especially on the beach or in the water. Cabo San Lucas makes for a perfect vacation backdrop no matter what the season is, and it’s the sunny temperatures and close access to the ocean that make the best sportfishing resort in Cabo , Marina Fiesta, the perfect spot. Not only is the resort located right along the pier, but travelers who are visiting during the month of October will find this to be the perfect chance to compete in the famous Bisbee tournament.
For those who don’t know, Marina Fiesta shares that the Bisbee tournaments take place each year for all the fans of the sport to gather to see just who exactly will be taking home the top prize. The event, which is known officially as Bisbee’s Black and Blue Tournament, is known as the world’s richest fishing tournament.
The top prizes expand each and every year, something that makes the competition quite fierce. There is a base entry fee of $5,000, but there are several levels to the competition. The more a participant puts in, the better of a chance they have of winning their money and much more back. People from all over the world travel to Cabo San Lucas to participate in this exciting event, something that no one will want to miss out on. Even those who don’t participate will want to be in town to see all of the action.
For all those who are still hoping to register to compete, the best sportfishing resort in Cabo , Marina Fiesta, suggests to do so soon before all of the spots have been filled. Although the early bird deadline has passed, there is still plenty of time to register before the event, which takes place October 20-24.
For more information about Cabo San Lucas or planning a trip here, visit Marina Fiesta online at their official website: http://www.marinafiestaresort.com/
